schema.description: A model to represent an application for observing time. The model is intended to express all of the concepts required to specify the scientific parameters of the application in sufficient detail to allow the proposal to be reviewed and allocated time. It does not cover all the technical detail of instrument setup that would be needed to actually schedule the observations, although the intention is that information about targets etc. could be automatically transferred to an observing system.

column.description: primary key for AbstractProposal
discriminator column for proposal:AbstractProposal sub-types
the proposal title
a short summary/abstract of the proposal
the type of proposal
the date that the proposal was submitted
the proposal can go on to allocation
the date when all the proposals are due

table.description: The justification for the proposal. Note that the justification is for reading by humans and is not parsed to extract things like source lists - that sort of information must be entered in the correct place in the model.

column.description: primary key for Justification
the full text of the justification
the format of the text
